bits

Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • bits.Problem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bits.IProblem, java.lang.Iterable<bits.IClause>

    public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
implements bits.IProblem
    A class which represents a collection of IClause objects, and which amounts to a satisfiability problem. Problem is essentially a ArrayList of IClause objects, and additionally provides several useful methods for combining Problem objects, especially performing logical operations such as and and or on such objects. This class is the superclass of numerous generic satisfiability problems.
    Since:
    2004/08/26
    Version:
    1.41
    Author:
    Kerry Michael Soileau

    email: ksoileau2@yahoo.com

    website: http://kerrysoileau.com/index.html

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs an instance of Problem which contains the IClauses found in the parameter clause.
      Problem(bits.IProblem iproblem) 
      Problem(java.util.List<bits.IClause> v)
      Constructs an instance of Problem which contains the IClauses found in the parameter v.
